messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Discussing new, drastic budget changes to 7 yo. and 3...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/9/2007 2:03:41 P.M. Eastern Standard Time, marla@nycap.rr.com writes: Or we ll get one item and tell them to put the other on their  wish
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/9/2007 2:03:41 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
marla@... writes:

Or we'll get one item
and tell them to put the other on their wish list. We do this weekly,
but this next budget is going to be much more drastic and I'm
wondering how to discuss this with them and handle it at the store,
when I'm going to be saying that we have to hold up on things much
more than we have in the past.

Any ideas?

Thanks!

Marla


Dear Marla,
Please check out eBay and _www.freecycle.org_ (http://www.freecycle.org)
where you can get so MANY things for reduced prices and free! The most important
part of your family is there - the love - everything else will fall right
into place. Best of luck to you.
Adriana




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
